title: 2018 Ireland Abortion Referendum
description_short: List of campaign websites from Ireland's 2018 abortion referendum.
description_long: On 25 May 2018, Ireland held a referendum to decide whether or not the country should repeal the Eighth Amendment of its constitution. The table below lists campaign organisations related to the referendum and their position on the issue (repeal or keep), along with links to live and archived versions of their websites.
